title: Party Host

fields.name: Send Invitations:
fields.value: Send an invitation to x players, where x is equal to your score divided by 10 rounded up.

fields.name: Party Time! (1x Locked):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked when every player has an invitation. Use during evening. Tonight every alive player shares a chat, and Factional chats are disabled. Night actions go on as normal.

desc:
Post 210
*It's party time!* (Role concept from Epicmafia)
